message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. After considering the value I believe the product holds, I would like to propose a price of $75.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $82.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $80.
